dublin_core.dcvalue: Neuropsychological testing is a prime criterion of good practice to document cognitive deficits in a rapidly aging population Telecommunication technologies may overcome limitations related to test administration We compared performance of the Italian videoconference based version of the Mini Mental State Examination VMMSE with performance of the standard MMSE administered face to face F2F to validate the Italian version of the 28 item VMMSE
Telemedicine journal and e-health : the official journal of the American Telemedicine Association
Videoconference-based mini mental state examination: a validation study.
